alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Marshall; Poweshiek; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 05 at 6:03PM CST until March 05 at 7:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Poweshiek County in central Iowa... Southeastern Marshall County in central Iowa... Southern Tama County in central Iowa... Northeastern Jasper County in central Iowa... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 602 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Newton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * The tornado will be near... Rock Creek Lake around 610 PM CST. Grinnell around 620 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Toledo and Tama. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
